mapper.select: select portfolio_id, title, content, tech, substring_index(img_url, ',', 1) as img_url from portfolio WHERE user_id = #{value} order by portfolio_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio (user_id, title, content, tech, img_url, github_url) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tech}, #{img_url}, #{github_url})
mapper.select: select users.user_name, portfolio_id, title, content, tech, img_url , github_url from portfolio, users where portfolio.user_id = users.user_id and portfolio_id = #{value}
